CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 19, 1962, pg. 11 reads: "Mother's Day Event - Members of LaBeaux Mondes paid tribute to their mothers at an event last Sunday at the Greene Hearth. Standing behind their mothers, members are (left to right) Maria Terry, Julee Bright, Betty McDonald, Faye Drake, Raye Giddens, Hilda Aston, Thelma Green, Patricia Struthers, Mary Lewis, Antoinette Armes, Marion Porter, Patsy Taylor and Margaret Heflin.  Mothers, seated are Mmes. Lois Terry, Marcella Chambers, Juanita Philips, Mary Edwards, Gertrude Locust, Thelma Cotton, Julia Lewis, Mabel Armes, Jean Epps, Eleanor Davis and Minnie Epps. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of LaBeaux Mondes back row from left: Maria Terry, Julee Bright, Betty McDonald, Faye Drake, Raye Giddens, Hilda Aston, Thelma Green, Patricia Struthers, Mary Lewis, Antoinette Armes, Marion Porter, Patsy Taylor, Margaret Heflin; and their mothers, seated: Lois Terry, Marcella Chambers, Juanita Philips, Mary Edwards, Gertrude Locust, Thelma Cotton, Julia Lewis, Mabel Armes, Jean Epps, Eleanor Davis, and Minnie Epps, posed in Greene Hearth for Mother's Day celebration
